page.title: 03Rose Queen/Farming
page.content:
{ROSE QUEEN. the Maypole.In we skipped and started. In the cross Emma was standing next to Lisa,who is so tall her feet hardly touched the ground.Some people's hats fell off but Mrs.Allen was very pleased with us.What an exciting day I'd had.
{FARMING IN CROSSENS My grandparents live at Hollywood farm.Besides the farmhouse there is a shed for storing potatoes, and a Dutch barn which used to be used storing the sheaves of corn when it was cut by a self_binder.Now the barn contains bins to store and dry the grain cut by the combine harvester.There are eight fields round the farm in which are grown potatoes,carrots and other vegatables.
